attributes.action: Enforce party election candidates to disclose who they are representing,
attributes.additional_details: Many other areas of our services and products are governed by legislation not to misrepresent about how they work or the purpose of them.  I want the same for residents when voting.  To know who and want we are voting for. The public deserve transparency and correct information to make an informed decision.
attributes.background: Change the legislation and guidance so that the pubic are not mislead, if a candidate belongs to a party political party and their ultimate goal is to represent under this banner, they should and must display  this information. Emblem and description should be displayed on the ballot paper .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for candidates to have to declare if they are members of a political party and have that information on the ballot paper if that is something you would like to see happen.
